arrTestimonials.name: Roos
arrTestimonials.message: Me parece genial poder "comprar ropa" frecuentemente sin recargar mi bolsillo ni el medio ambiente.

arrTestimonials.name: Anónimo
arrTestimonials.message: ¡Nunca es tarde para aprender! Mis hijas de 13 y 16 años a menudo encuentran cosas muy guay en las bolsas. Me encanta cómo esto les ha enseñado que es posible conseguir buena ropa de segunda mano. Pienso que la sostenibilidad y la consciencia medioambiental tendrían que tener un lugar más importante en la educación, ¡en todos los niveles!

arrTestimonials.name: Participante en Barendrecht
arrTestimonials.message: Someone in my Loop landed a new job. Guess who's dress she wore to her interview?

arrTestimonials.name: Nienke
arrTestimonials.message: The best part is being able to try clothes that you would never pick in the store, and realizing that you really like them.

arrTestimonials.name: Lia
arrTestimonials.message: A nice bonus is that you get to know people in your neighborhood, usually neighbors with pretty green hearts as well. As a result, it is a small step – if you really need something but would rather not buy it – to toss a loan request into the Loop, such as for ski pants or a costume for a theme party!

arrTestimonials.name: Ella
arrTestimonials.message: After receiving the third bag, it hits me just what an incredible amount of clothes we have in our closets!
